arena_selection.no_permission: <dark_red>✖ You do not have permission to use this command.</dark_red>
arena_selection.error_setting_pos: <red>❌ Failed to set selection position at [{posX}, {posY}, {posZ}]. Try again.</red>

arena_create.success: <green>✔ Arena '{name}' created successfully with '{blockType}' in world '{world}'!</green>
arena_create.no_permission: <dark_red>✖ You do not have permission to create an arena.</dark_red>
arena_create.error_creating: <red>❌ Error creating arena '{name}' with '{blockType}' in world '{world}'. Please check your inputs.</red>
